infoPanelText: All transactions below IDR 10,000 or above IDR 100,000,000 (to banks other than BCA, BNI, BRI, Mandiri, and Permata) which are approved after 1pm (UTC+7) will be disbursed on the next business day.
pendingTooltip: The payout has successfully been created and is awaiting the end user's response
emptyCardMsg: Please change the filter or create new payout
